experience.title: Founder at talksoftennis.com
experience.description: talksoftennis aims to be a site which spreads information about the field of Tennis in India. It is your go to place to understand the path a tennis player in India needs to take to reach the professional circuit. We also intend to create a community of tennis players in India in order to enable players to benefit from the experience and advice of each other in their journeys.
experience.description_html: talksoftennis aims to be a site which spreads information about the field of Tennis in India. It is your go to place to understand the path a tennis player in India needs to take to reach the professional circuit. We also intend to create a community of tennis players in India in order to enable players to benefit from the experience and advice of each other in their journeys. <!---->

experience.title: Livelihoods research intern
experience.description: As an intern in the livelihoods practise team I will be conducting research on various topics like women's participation in the labour force, role of technology in India's agriculture etc. Further, I would be compiling  and assessing the research in order to create a knowledge product which would contain the final results of our research and analysis.
experience.description_html: As an intern in the livelihoods practise team I will be conducting research on various topics like women's participation in the labour force, role of technology in India's agriculture etc. Further, I would be compiling and assessing the research in order to create a knowledge product which would contain the final results of our research and analysis. <!---->

experience.title: Marketing head
experience.description: I as part of GapXedu, will be handling marketing for the Anvesha, gap year program that Rishihood will be launching. I shall be involved in each detail from social media to pre marketing to campaigns. This comes as part of a collaboration that GapXedu and Rishhood are doing in the sphere of Gap years.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: GapX is an online platform to help gap year students in India plan out their gap years. We aim to offer the best opportunities specialised for gap year students while providing them with a community of other students.
experience.description_html: GapX is an online platform to help gap year students in India plan out their gap years. We aim to offer the best opportunities specialised for gap year students while providing them with a community of other students. <!---->

experience.title: Writer in the news team of The Edict, Ashoka
experience.description: The edict is a student run online newspaper of Ashoka University. Being in the news writer's team, I regularly write articles regarding the current events related to the university.
experience.description_html: The edict is a student run online newspaper of Ashoka University. Being in the news writer's team, I regularly write articles regarding the current events related to the university. <!---->

experience.title: Curriculum Designer
experience.description: I will be providing an end to end formation of the 'Gap month' program for Vishwa Scholars which will be their pilot model for a larger, full year gap program. We will be doing heavy research, strategic planning and building of the program so that it becomes the most valuable and accessible gap month program for all gap year students in India

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Interlude is an online platform which helps gap year students avail opportunities for their gap year.
